wordGroup: durability test 耐久性试验；施工测量；寿命试验；疲劳试验
chemical durability 化学稳定性；化学耐久性

sentences.en: Airlines recommend hard-sided cases for durability.
sentences.cn: 航空公司推荐使用硬边的提箱以求耐用。

sentences.en: Technological advances have greatly improved the durability of toys.
sentences.cn: 科技进步大大提高了玩具的耐用性。

sentences.en: We have always advertised our use of the Endure process, but the new study shows that despite our socks' durability, our average customer actually purchases new Dura-Socks every three months.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在宣传 Endure 的生产过程，但最新研究表明，尽管我们的袜子具有耐久性，但我们的普通客户实际上还是要每三个月购买一次新的 Dura-Socks。
